name: Heroes vs Beast
description:
There are 4 randomly chosen players. You play on one keyboard because i have no idea how to do online stuff in gms. Anywho the players are controlled with:

WASD to move Q & E to attack.
FCVB to move X & G to attack.
IJKL to move U & O to attack.
Arrows to move Rshift & Numpad 0 to attack.

Yeah it is a bit scuft but Parsec is a thing so...

Sprites were made by O and A
Programing was made by E and a bit of ************ Which is a random guy
